definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
component in Chinese characters, occurring in 青, 毒, 素 etc/see also 青字頭|青字头[qing1 zi4 tou2]
to express/to show/to say/to state/to indicate/to mean
to show/to show off/to display/to manifest/expression/manifestation/show/display/performance (at work etc)/behavior
representative/delegate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4],名[ming2]/to represent/to stand for/on behalf of/in the name of
to make clear/to make known/to state clearly/to indicate/known
to declare one's position/to say where one stands

sentences.english: She never learned how to read a milometer,or any meter.
sentences.chinese: 不管是里程錶，還是什麼表，她從來就不會看。

sentences.english: Consequently, you will find that almost every one owns either a watch or a clock.
sentences.chinese: 因此，你會發現幾乎每個人都擁有一隻表或一個鐘。

sentences.english: I need to buy a watch with a second hand.
sentences.chinese: 我要買一塊有秒針的表。

sentences.english: You cannot use an external table in a sub-query
sentences.chinese: 不能在子查詢中使用一個外部表。

sentences.english: You have reviewed the cash flow statement before investment decision is made.
sentences.chinese: 在進行投資決定前，你會先詳閱綜合現金流量表。

sentences.english: Turn the dc meters switch to TR1.
This is the table of constants in its entirety.
sentences.chinese: 這是一張完整的常數表。

sentences.english: You can uSE your comp uter to create your own fashion spreadsheet.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用電腦創建自己的穿衣表。

sentences.english: Cannot specify tables to truncate for this template.
sentences.chinese: 不能爲該模板指定要截斷的表。

sentences.english: The slides show taxes paying form of tax system of Republic of Uzbekistan.
sentences.chinese: 幻燈片提供的是烏茲別克斯坦共和國稅務系統納稅表。

sentences.english: Every table space has one or more containers.
sentences.chinese: 每個表空間都有一個或多個容器。

sentences.english: To start, we will define and fill an employee table.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我們將定義和填充一個僱員表。

sentences.english: Accept the default in which all columns of the table are selected.
sentences.chinese: 使用默認值，其中這個表的所有列都是選中的。

sentences.english: This is the stock quotes. This is an anti-virus software.
sentences.chinese: 這是股票報價信息表，這是一個殺毒軟件。

sentences.english: Chapter 17 wraps up the book with a list of "code smells" and heuristics.
sentences.chinese: 第十七章將“代碼的味道”和啓示列成一張表。

sentences.english: The table uses a beamer below the surface with a mirror to project the visualizations.
sentences.chinese: 下面的表使用一個帶有鏡面投影儀項目的可視化。

definition: to contrast/to compare/to place side by side for comparison (as parallel texts)/to check
summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report
to set or synchronize a watch
